name: Antique Plume Fossil
rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Basic Colorless Pokémon. This card can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat.  At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

abilities.name: Plume Protection
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.
